content:
I'm going to start using the "Event Planning" stream for administrative stuff about Open Source Day. I would like a place to dump information that people might be interested in without cluttering the main stream.

If you are interested in what is happening with Open Source Day and/or able to help in the issue queue that day, you might want to make sure you are subscribed to the "Event Planning" stream.
I will continue to post Code Review updates here for anyone to see.
